title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When the ImageAnalyzer example is opened in F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only) build, the scrollbars are enabled. Despite being movable, these scrollbars do not have any effect. Furthermore, when a small image such as an icon is opened, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not serve any purpose.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in the F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only) build.
2. Observe the enabled scrollbars.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars and notice their lack of functionality.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe the misleading behavior of the scrollbars.
